core.title: National Historical Geographic Information System
core.shortDescription: General record for all available themes captured by the National Historical Geographic Information System (NHGIS) statistical demographic data program of the United States Census Bureau; geography covers the United States; time period covers 1790-present
core.fullDescription: The NHGIS provides a user-friendly interface for exploring and downloading Census GIS files and tabular datasets. NHGIS is a project of Integrated Public Use Microdata Series (IPUMS), a demographic and population data aggregator housed at the University of Minnesota. For more information NHGIS and IPUMS and to download Census data, visit their website at [https://nhgis.org](https://nhgis.org)
core.accessCondition: See NHGIS guidelines for instructions on citation (https://www.nhgis.org/citation-and-use-nhgis-data)

temporal.temporalNotes: NHGIS data covers 1790-present day in increments of 10-year, 5-year, 3-year, and 1-year estimates.
